item.title: Windows Virtual Memory Intro
item.description: Note: This passage is mainly translated by Google translator, please turn to the Chinese version for more accurate expression if possible. Virtual memory provides a logical view of memory, it does not correspond to the layout of physical memory. During operation, the memory manager maps virtual addresses to physical addresses with the help of hardware support. Each process has its own virtual address space, and it will feel that it
